com.teamdev.jxbrowser.chromium

Interface ResourceHandler


  • public interface ResourceHandler
    Allows handling process of loading resources such as HTML, images, JavaScript, CSS files, etc. You can use this handler to cancel loading specified resources. For example, you can tell web browser engine not to load images or HTML from a specified URL.
    允许处理加载资源的过程，例如HTML，图像，JavaScript，CSS文件等。您可以使用此处理程序来取消加载指定的资源。例如，您可以告诉Web浏览器引擎不要从指定的URL加载图像或HTML。

    • Method Summary

      All Methods  Instance Methods  Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canLoadResource(ResourceParams params)
      Invoked when native engine decides whether specified resource should be requested from web server and loaded.
      当本机引擎决定是否应从Web服务器请求并加载指定资源时调用。

    • Method Detail

      • canLoadResource

        boolean canLoadResource(ResourceParams params)
        Invoked when native engine decides whether specified resource should be requested from web server and loaded.

        If this method throws an exception, then default behavior will be used - the resource will be loaded.
        当本机引擎决定是否应从Web服务器请求并加载指定资源时调用。如果此方法引发异常，则将使用默认行为-资源将被加载。
        Parameters:
        params - information about resource. -有关资源的信息。
        Returns:
        false to cancel resource loading. 取消资源加载。
